meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Public Facility Corporation
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Briefing Room 6ES and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes of November 7, 2023 Board Meeting

agenda_items.title: Election of Board Secretary
agenda_items.description: Election of Vacant Dallas PFC Board Secretary Position

agenda_items.title: Briefing on Tax-Exempt Bonds
agenda_items.description: Briefing on Dallas Public Facility Corporation’s authority to issue tax-exempt bonds as defined by the Public Facility Corporation Act

agenda_items.title: Financing for The Riviera Apartments
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing the negotiation and execution of a Term Sheet and inducing the proposed financing of up to $55,000,000 of tax-exempt bonds for The Riviera Apartments in partnership with Savoy and AIDS Services of Dallas to be located at 11700 Audelia Rd., Dallas, TX
agenda_items.presenter: Aaron Eaquinto/Albert Gonzalez, Jim Plummer, Tim Nelson

agenda_items.title: Directors and Officers Insurance
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of Directors and Officers Insurance coverage for the Dallas Public Facility Corporation’s Board of Directors and Officers

agenda_items.title: 2024 Annual Budget
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the Dallas Public Facility Corporation’s 2024 Annual Budget

agenda_items.title: Treasurer’s Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of Dallas PFC Treasurer’s Report

agenda_items.title: Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of Dallas PFC Pipeline Report

financial_items.description: Financing of tax-exempt bonds for The Riviera Apartments
